hymn.title: Christ has put on human nature

layout.singingstanza: Christ has put on hu -- man na -- ture and be -- come a man like me, He has died up -- on the cross that I from A -- dam might be free, He has ris -- en and as Spir -- it He has come to live in me That He might be my life. Glo -- ry! glo -- ry! Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! Glo -- ry! glo -- ry! Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! Glo -- ry! glo -- ry! Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! For Christ is now my life!

lyrics.stanza: Christ has put on human nature and become a man like me, He has died upon the cross that I from Adam might be free, He has risen and as Spirit He has come to live in me That He might be my life.
Glory! glory! Hallelujah! Glory! glory! Hallelujah! Glory! glory! Hallelujah! For Christ is now my life!
Christ has put on human nature and become a man like me, He has died upon the cross that I from Adam might be free, He has risen and as Spirit He has come to live in me That He might be my life.
Vict'ry! vict'ry! Hallelujah! Vict'ry! vict'ry! Hallelujah! Vict'ry! vict'ry! Hallelujah! For Christ is now my all!
